body.name: Brickell Men's Balancing Face Toner for Men, Natural and Organic Alcohol-Free Facial Toner with Witch Hazel, 8 Ounce, Scented

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Brickell Men's Products Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 3 mins
features: What It Does: This refreshing alcohol & oil free men's face toner removes excess oil, unclogs & minimizes pores, and clears skin. It can be used in the morning as facial toner or as a mid day "refresher" 'to reduce shine and perk up dull skin.
How It Works: This face toner for men uses cucumber distillate minimizes pores and soothes irritated skin.
Who It's For: Our toner for face is best for normal to oily and blemish prone skin. Men with any skin type can use as an anytime skin refresher.

Who We Are: Brickell creates skincare and grooming products for men using natural & certified organic ingredients. Our products are sold in over 100 countries and have appeared in GQ, Men's Health, Men's Journal, and other popular men’s magazines.
Key Ingredients: Natural & Organic ingredients, including Cucumber, Witch Hazel, Peppermint & Aloe Vera.

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Balances skin tone, reduces shine, & minimizes pores Alcohol & oil free All Natural & Organic Refreshing peppermint & cucumber scent Comes with a convenient spray cap See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Refreshing experience
reviews.reviewText: Another great product from this brand. I really like the way it gets applied on my face . They use this spray that creates a mist that covers your face evenly. Some days i could smell the cucumber others I get the witch hazel which I'm not used to yet. It's very hearhty..when the toner is drying , i could smell and feel the peppermint. I wish they could add some mint or eucalyptus for added tingling effect .When you apply it , try holding your breath. If you don't, you will inhale the mist and it feels weird .It feels good to spray it right after you wake up too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my skin routine!
reviews.reviewText: I had never used a toner before but wanted to incorporate something else to my skin routine to hopefully help with my oily face. Overall, I really liked it! The Brickell face toner is made with natural and organic ingredients, which is a big plus for me. It has a refreshing scent and feels incredibly soothing on the skin. I noticed that it helped to balance my skin's pH levels and minimize the appearance of pores. Plus, it didn't leave my skin feeling dry or tight and my oil levels have decreased.If you're looking for a toner that's gentle, effective, and made with quality ingredients, I would definitely recommend giving the Brickell face toner a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to my daily routine
reviews.reviewText: First off, the scent is very fresh. Cucumber heavy on the front, with a bit of peppermint on the end. Doesn’t smell harsh, chemically or anything of the sort. Natural, soothing scent.Upon application there is a cooling, soothing sensation. No burning, tingling, drying, etc.After the first few days of use I noticed that areas of my skin that had broken out previously, but seemed to not be healing, started to seem less red and inflamed. As if my skin was finally getting back to an equilibrium. My overall skin health seemed better as well.After roughly two weeks use I can say the benefits seemed to continue. My skin looks and feels more nourished. For lack of a better word, ‘even.’ Not so blotchy, red, inflamed.Definitely an enjoyable and worthwhile addition to my skin regimen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Oddly enough, I've never used a toner before. I have both morning and evening facial routines, but never with a toner.I began using it for a week right after I showered in the morning. The scent of cucumber is a welcome addition to the morning. The peppermint scent is light.The label claims to reduce shine and it appears to be accurate. My forehead and nose aren't oily to begin with, but it seems to be less so with this toner. Usually by noon, I have to splash water on my face to freshen up. With the toner, I didn't have the need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: As someone that hadn't used a toner before, lately I've been been trying to leverage products which will make me look and feel more comfortable in my own skin as I get older. This toner feels refreshing to put on and smells very clean. After a week or so I can tell my skin looks less inflamed and I can already notice a difference in my natural blemishes. Now a valuable part of my skin routine, I feel this effort will help me look more how I feel about myself and allows me to make the impression I want people to have when they see my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like new skin
reviews.reviewText: Okay I’m 62 years old and I’ve never used a toner before. I bought this after having a facial and the lady performing my facial suggested a toner. Since I use Brickell products I decided to go with their toner. I have dry skin and of course aging skin. Now to the toner, when I first started using it I loved the light cucumber smell and how refreshing it was. Honestly I considered that a win even if I didn’t see any other differences but I did. My skin is more even and it seems to make my moisturizer work even better. I’ve only been using it a couple of weeks and I can already see and feel a difference. I’d recommend this to anyone who has uneven skin tones and just wants to boost their moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A key part of my skin care routine
reviews.reviewText: • Solid for Everyday Use: I’ve added Brickell’s Face Toner to my morning and night routines. Simple and effective. • Real Results: Since using it, my skin’s looking better - smoother and clearer. • Natural Stuff Works: Appreciate the natural ingredients like aloe and witch hazel. Feels good, no irritation. • Quick and Easy: Doesn’t take much time. Quick swipe after washing my face, and I’m done. • Good for Any Skin Type: Works well for my skin. Balances oil without drying out.In short, Brickell’s Face Toner does the job well. A no-nonsense, quality product I’d recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Welcome Addition to Skincare Routine
reviews.reviewText: This toner - which I've never used toner before - provides a fresh deep clean I started to use after my moisturizer and I have appreciated the results since adding it to my skincare routine.

I use this with the clarifying gel face wash from Brickell and they work well together. I love the cucumber/peppermint scent. After a week, I can already see that my skin looks healthier. Highly recommended as part of your daily routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Really good if you know why you buy it and how to use it
reviews.reviewText: It really does work, but like with anything else you have to read the label. People buy this product because it's expensive and because it's in top search results, then they complain that this doesn't work. It's not the product that is failing but you not reading the labels. Although, I admire your bravery. Using things on your face without even knowing what they do? Given the fact that skin care is a very difficult subject (and expensive) knowing what you're getting should be the must.In short, yes it works.No it's not for everyone. YES, reading labels is required nowadays and for this product too.Great for refreshing your face on the go.Great for cleaning your face if your tap water is just too harsh.Great as a base for hyaluronic acid serums.Yes, they have samples for pretty much free so you can test it before you throw your money away.

Acquistato per integrarlo nella mia skincare quotidiana con gli altri prodotti Brickell.Al terzo utilizzo mi ha infiammato il viso in una maniera assurda, causandomi un forte rossore e bruciore. Ho provato ad utilizzarlo un'altra volta il giorno successivo ma con lo stesso risultato..alla fine ho dovuto buttarlo.Pessima esperienza con questo tonico, non al livello degli altri prodotti del marchio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Für fettige / ölige Haut gut geeignet
reviews.reviewText: Ich nutze das Produkt täglich / morgens in Kombination mit der Gesichtscreme sowie 2-3x die Woche mit dem Peeling. Ich glaube, die Kombination macht es aus :).Meine Haut fühlt sich tatsächlich morgens sehr erfrischt an.Zudem hält die Packung Ewigkeiten.Empfehlung!
Light, refreshing and smells great. Goes on easy with pump spray application. Highly recommended as part of your daily routine! Will definitely order again!
